content.question: In a certain region of space, there is an electric potential difference of <math alttext="120 volts" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>120</mn><mtext>V</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> between two points that are <math alttext="0.25 meter" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0.25</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> apart. What is the magnitude of the average electric field in between the two points?

choices.label: <math alttext="15 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>/</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="30 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>/</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="240 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>240</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>/</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="480 newtons per coulomb" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>480</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>N</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>/</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
